posts.title: Inflatable Solar Lantern/Phone Charger
posts.content: Keep your phone juiced up when you disconnect from the modern world by packing along this inflatable solar lantern and phone charger. This 2-in-1 device inflates into a 150 lumen waterproof lantern that doubles as a handy phone charger that packs flat for easy storage.

posts.title: The Mission Chinese Food Cookbook
posts.content: Learn how to make top-shelf Chinese cuisine while immersing yourself in the story of the Mission Chinese Food restaurant. Written by famed chef Danny Bowien, you’ll learn the tips and tricks necessary to whip up these heavenly plates.

posts.title: Muffin Top Cupcake Molds
posts.content: Be honest – do these pants make my edible stomach area look fat? These novelty cupcake molds are styled to look like a pair of jeans that create the illusion your snack has totally let themselves go and grown a hefty yet scrumptious muffin top.

posts.title: Grinning Teeth Dog Toy
posts.content: Give your furry friend an amusing and comical expression when you play a game of fetch using the grinning teeth dog toy. This novelty toy contains a set of big pearly whites that give the illusion your pet has learned to smile just like people.

posts.title: Hotel Hanger Adapters
posts.content: Hotel amenity thieves rejoice! Now you can stock up on resort grade wooden hangers for a fraction of the cost when you purchase these hanger adapters. The adapters transform them into a standard hanger you can utilize to steam your shirts or hang in your closet.

posts.title: Giant Chess Set
posts.content: Exercise the mind and body as you try to best your opponent playing on this giant chess set. Made from tough all-weather resin, the board is designed to easily snap together piece by piece so you can take it apart and transport it anywhere.

posts.title: Pet Bowtie
posts.content: While wearing the pet bowtie, your dog’s tail is the last thing he’ll be chasing when he hits the park. Once old Sparky strolls down the sidewalk looking dapper with his stylish bowtie, the bitches at Bark Park won’t stand a chance against his charm.

posts.title: Blood Bath Shower Gel
posts.content: Satisfy your twisted and morbid desires as you get ready to start your day by bathing with the blood bath shower gel. This cherry scented gel bears a striking “blood red” hue and comes sealed in novelty container shaped like a human blood transfusion bag.

posts.title: The World Atlas Of Coffee
posts.content: Learn about the long and fascinating journey your prized roasts take before they make it to your mug by reading The World Atlas of Coffee. You’ll learn about every aspect of this incredible plant – from its origins and history, to the cultivation process and beyond.

posts.title: Mr. Sponge Holder
posts.content: Add a touch of class to doing the dishes by storing your sponge in the Mr. Sponge holder. When the sponge isn’t in use, it conveniently hangs high and dry on the collar of Mr. Sponge, creating the illusion that he’s sporting a fashionable bow tie.

posts.title: Super Mario Bros. Monopoly
posts.content: Two of the most iconic games in history have now combined forces to break up your family like never before. The pieces are styled to look like pixelated characters while the board is designed to look like a level from the classic NES game.

posts.title: Multi-Tool Attachment Roasting Stick
posts.content: Cook any campfire meal to perfection using this multi-tool attachment roasting stick. The practical design lets you switch between various attachments so that you can cook anything from hamburgers to marshmallows to hotdogs.
